subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 21 (AP) — A 43-game hitting streak in the minor leagues does not warrant a place in Cooperstown or a multimillion-dollar contract extension. It did, however, help get Brandon Watson another shot at the big leagues.
snippet: WASHINGTON, June 21 (AP) — A 43-game hitting streak in the minor leagues does not warrant a place in Cooperstown or a multimillion-dollar contract extension. It did, however, help get Brandon Watson another shot at the big leagues.
